body.name: Sukin Facial Moisturizer Pump, Hydrating Face Cream with Wheat Germ and Vitamin E to Deeply Nourish, Soften and Improve Skin Texture, 4.23 Fl Oz
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: MOISTURIZER FACE CREAM: Perfect for all skin types, this facial moisturizer hydrates and refreshes the skin. The perfect all rounder, it improves texture and moisture, leaving skin feeling more nourished, smooth and healthy

INGREDIENTS FROM NATURE: Our moisturizer is enriched with a beautiful blend of Rosehip, Avocado, Sesame Seed & Jojoba Oils. Soothing Aloe Vera refreshes skin, while Wheat Germ & Vitamin E help improve texture and protect skin’s moisture barrier

CRUELTY FREE SKIN CARE PRODUCTS SINCE 2007: We take pride in our range of clean beauty products, which includes face cleansers, exfoliants, oils, body creams, scrubs, hand washes, hair shampoos and conditioners, cruelty-free since the day we started

VEGAN NATURAL FACE CARE: Sukin offers a complete product range to bring out the best in your skin. Using natural ingredients like aloe vera & rosehip oil, our products assist in balancing the skin & leaving it nourished.

SUKIN ORGANICS: Everything we need to nourish our bodies can be found in nature, so at Sukin, that's what we use. Our products are vegan, paraben, sulphate & cruelty-free and made with natural ingredients that help keep your body, face & hair healthy
body.description: SUKIN SIGNATURE SKIN CARE Your natural alternative. Feel good about what goes onto your skin with Sukin’s Signature Range. Featuring Avocado, Aloe Vera, Jojoba, Rosehip & Shea Butter to nourish skin, along with our Signature Scent of Mandarin, Tangerine, Vanilla & Lavender to refresh the senses. No false promises, no harmful processes, just ingredients from nature that work. Our Values: Natural Ingredients, Australian Made, Non-GMO, Vegan Skincare, Cruelty Free, Recyclable Packaging, Carbon Neutral, and Grey Water Safe

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At Sukin, we are committed to delivering the perfect balance of naturalness, affordability and safety, to as many people as we can the world over. ​ Sukin products are 98.8% naturally derived, the difference is how we keep our naturally derived ingredients safe for your use. SUKIN SIGNATURE SKIN CARE Your natural alternative. Feel good about what goes onto your skin with Sukin’s Signature Range. Featuring Avocado, Aloe Vera, Jojoba, Rosehip & Shea Butter to nourish skin, along with our Signature Scent of Mandarin, Tangerine, Vanilla & Lavender to refresh the senses. No false promises, no harmful processes, just ingredients from nature that work. Our Values: Natural Ingredients, Australian Made, Non-GMO, Vegan Skincare, Cruelty Free, Recyclable Packaging, Carbon Neutral, and Grey Water Safe

Micellar Cleansing Water Hydrating Facial Masque Revitalizing Facial Scrub Hydrating Mist Toner Facial Moisturiser Moisture Restoring Night Cream Benefit: Infused with gentle Aloe Vera to thoroughly remove makeup and dirt build up, whilst soothing and purifying the complexion. A cream based masque, (and smells amazing!) from a rich blend of Mango Seed Butter, Avocado, Olive Fruit and Jojoba Oils. Uses gentle granules of biodegradable Bamboo Extract and Walnut Shell Powder to lightly exfoliate the skin, removing unwanted dirt and impurities. Combines Rosewater and Chamomile to help soothe, purify and cool tired skin. It can be used after cleansing or any time your skin is feeling tired, stressed or overheated. Hydrates and softens skin through a beautiful blend of Rosehip, Avocado, Sesame and Jojoba Oils. Our deeply hydrating Moisture Restoring Night Cream nourishes the skin while you sleep through a blend of Rosehip, Evening Primrose and Jojoba Oils. Key Ingredients: Cucumber, Aloe Vera, Chamomile Mango Butter, Avocado, Pineapple Extract, Olive Fruit Extract Aloe Vera, Rosehip Oil, Avocado, Sesame Oil Chamomile, Rosewater Aloe Vera, Rosehip Oil, Avocado, Sesame Oil Rosehip Oil, Avocado Oil, Borage Oil, Vitamin E

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sukin products are the only ones I use.
reviews.reviewText: I'm 77 and have been using Sukin products for many years. Not heavy or greasy but just the right amount of moisture for my 77 year old face. I am so glad that I can order my products from Amazon because not too many stores carry them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this lotion!
reviews.reviewText: This facial lotion works great with my combination skin. It moisturizes my dry spots but isn’t so heavy to make my oily areas worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great daily moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This is a light, easy spreading cream that feels great. The pump is convenient too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful product that works and is safe.
reviews.reviewText: Great to remove makeup and smells fresh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely light weight moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I decided to buy this after reading positive reviews on MakeupAlley and Amazon. My skin is not very dry and does not require a heavyweight moisturizer. I have been using Dermalogica Intensive Moisturizer. I like that quite well but it is very expensive so I have been looking for an alternative. The Dermalogica is close to $40 for a 3.5 ounce tube. The Sukin is about $14 for a 4.25 ounce bottle. Compared to the Dermalogica the Sukin moisturizer is a little "thinner" but I actually like that. I was surprised that it has quite a noticeable smell -- kind of orange -- not sure whether this is a plus or a minus for me. But the moisturizer itself is very good in that it absorbs quickly, spreads easily, is not at all greasy in feeling and does not have any adverse reaction at all on my skin. I found that it can be a little difficult to control precisely how much comes out of the pump -- takes a bit of practice -- and you do not want to release too much as a little goes a long way. Then when thinking about a second bottle to take to the gym I saw that this is also sold in the same size bottle but with flip top cap top, so I bought that instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has been my favorite moisturizer for years! I would just like to leave a review to appreciate the careful packaging I received:) 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its not greasy or stinky or heavy feeling. I use it on my face and body. Never causes me to break out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like this product
reviews.reviewText: Discovered Sukin in Australia. Love the natural scent and light moisture. Very impressed with the ingredients (Australian products do not have nearly as many chemicals as US products, in general). This smells and feels just like the “Signature Hydrating Body Lotion”. Honestly think it’s the same exact product.
This is my go to moisturizer. Goes on silky, and absorbs into the skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing stuff, truly non greasy and absorbs quickly. Fragrance is nice, light and addictive. Just buy some ASAP you won’t regret it.
Très bien. Bonne quantité. Bonne qualité. Format pratique. Crème facile à utiliser. Ne colle pas et l’odeur est agréable
Går inte använda utan få huvudvärk - stinker billig parfym.

reviews.reviewTitle: Demasiado intenso cítricos para facial diario.
reviews.reviewText: No me parece un fluido facial al uso, es bastante espeso y la composición con cítricos 😶 resulta un poquito de más. A mi sí me gustan los cosméticos sin olor artificial y de plantas, pero éste no me gusta para el rostro. Supongo que cada persona es distinta, pero yo lo uso para el cuerpo. Piel fina, blanca y pecas, seca. Entonces ...❤️🌸
